Please select an industry below

By selecting an industry below, you will be taken to a team's webpage. Each student explored the historical use of Artificial Intelligence on an Industry. The impact of AI on the Industry. A single application of AI, and the societal, economic, cultural, enviornmental impact of that innovation. Also any potential concerns about bias or privacy.
